title: Trump Clashes with Emmanuel Macron at the NATO Summit | Ta-Nehisi Coates
itunes:title: Trump Clashes with Emmanuel Macron at the NATO Summit | Ta-Nehisi Coates
description:
An ad for the Peloton exercise bike sparks outrage, President Trump spars with France's Emmanuel Macron at the NATO summit, and Ta-Nehisi Coates discusses "The Water Dancer."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
